channel.title: Wierd sql error
channel.description:
My bro reset the comp cause we had a lot of viruses so i had to redownload my server. now when i try to run the server i get this error
[code]invalid authorization specification message from server "Acces denied for user root@localhost (using password YES)[/code]
any1 know how to fix it?
Somebody please answer me

item.title: Wierd sql error
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“xxdanxx135, post:2, topic:153704”]Well, go to start/my computer/hdd/program files/java, and find you’r correct java. And put this code in you’r run server.

“c:\program files\java\YOUJAVA HERE!\bin\java” -cp .;. server

Make sure you put everything the java folder says in the “YOUJAVA HERE!” spot.

~Dan[/quote]

That has nothing to do with his problem.

Itachi, make sure your password is right for your localhost.

Read full topic

item.title: Wierd sql error
item.dc:creator: @xxdanxx135 xxdanxx135
item.description:
@xxdanxx135 wrote:

Well, go to start/my computer/hdd/program files/java, and find you’r correct java. And put this code in you’r run server.

“c:\program files\java\YOUJAVA HERE!\bin\java” -cp .;. server

Make sure you put everything the java folder says in the “YOUJAVA HERE!” spot.

~Dan
